English: Deals [ffc800]{1}[-] M. DMG to the target and enemies nearby, stunning them for [64ffff]{2}[-] sec and healing allies within the range by [ffc800]{3}[-] HP. Activating [Grant Me Strength!] will reset Cooldown of this Skill, and remove Cooldown up to 3 Skill uses.

Over [64ffff]{1}[-] sec, heals own HP by [ffc800]{2}[-] and recovers {3} orbs of Mana, increasing ATK by [64ff64]{4}[-] for the duration. If own HP is full when the Skill is used, blocks [ffc800]{5}[-] DMG and casts a shield that grants CC Immunity, lasting for [64ff64]{6}[-] sec. If there are 3 or less allies, this effect will apply to all allies.

Attacks a random enemy 5 times, dealing [ffc800]{1}[-] M.DMG in total. If the target is not a Hero, deals additional [ffc800]{2}[-] M.DMG. While [Grant Me Strength!] is active, an enemy with highest ATK will be prioritized.

If own HP is full, increases ATK by [64ff64]{1}[-]. If not, heals own HP by [ffc800]{2}[-] every sec. Upon taking a fatal damage, consumes entire Mana to block [ffc800]{3}[-] damage and cast a shield that grants CC Immunity, lasting for [64ff64]{4}[-] sec. While the shield is active, Dakaris cannot recover Mana.
Upon activation, increases own ATK Spd by 500.
Increases duration of the shield by 5 sec.
Gains CC Immunity for the duration of Skill.
If own HP is full, recovers 300 Mana every sec.

At the beginning of the first battle, gains [Ancestral Advice] that increases own CC Resist by 200 for 5 sec. If [Ancestral Advice] is still active after 5 sec, dispels negative effects from 3 random allies, and increases their DEF by 50% for 10 sec. DEF Boost is irremovable.
Dakaris takes 10% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 100. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
Dakaris takes 12% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 120. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
Dakaris takes 14% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 140. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
Dakaris takes 17% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 170. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
Dakaris takes 21% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 210. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
Dakaris takes 25% reduced DMG, and increases CC Resist by 250. After using a Skill, the effects are doubled for 2 sec.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 1% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 1.2% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 1.4% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 1.7% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 2.1% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Judgment Upon Them!] Increases DMG by 50% and heals additional HP equal to 2.5% of the healed ally's Max HP.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 20%.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 24%.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 29%.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 35%.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 42%.
[Grant Me Strength!] Decreases Cooldown by 5 sec, and increases Heal Rate & Mana Recovery by 50%.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 20%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 24%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 29%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 35%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 42%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[May Their Agony End!] Increases DMG by 50%. If this Skill kills an enemy, it will cast once more.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 20% and grants shield to all allies.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 24% and grants shield to all allies.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 29% and grants shield to all allies.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 35% and grants shield to all allies.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 42% and grants shield to all allies.
[Might of the Ancestors!] Increases shield amount by 50% and grants shield to all allies.
